headline: McDonald's (NYSE:MCD) Declares US$1.77 Per Share Quarterly Dividend
summary: McDonald's (NYSE:MCD) recently affirmed its quarterly cash dividend of $1.77 per share, payable on June 16, 2025. Over the last quarter, McDonald's share price rose by 6%, amidst a relatively stable market environment characterized by the S&P 500's minor fluctuations and a broader trend of recovery. The 5.92% price increase aligns with general market trends and investor optimism. Key developments during the period include the company’s ongoing share buyback program and enhanced lobbying...

headline: McDonald's Announces Quarterly Cash Dividend, Payable on June 16, 2025
summary: McDonald's Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.77 per share of common stock payable on June 16, 2025 to shareholders of record at the close of business on June 2, 2025....
